item.title: Have you heard about RPI Bylaws?
item.description: RPI is governed by a Board of Trustees (BOT), empowered by the bylaws. Our governance structure includes the BOT, the President and Cabinet, Academic Leadership (Provost & Deans’ Council), the Faculty Senate, and Student Governance (Student Union, Student Senate, Undergraduate Council, & Graduate Council), along with Staff Engagement. Want to learn more? Dive into Standard 7 of RPI’s Self-Study for Middle States Accreditation, a team led by Dr. Andrew White & Ms. Rajni Soharu.

item.title: Screening of “Picture A Scientist” | April 10
item.description: Date: Thursday, April 10, 2025 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM - This documentary covers the stories of 3 scientists, Biologist Nancy Hopkins, Chemist Raychelle Burks, and Geologist Jane Willenbring, and the challenges they have overcome in their careers. It provides new perspectives on how to make science a more equitable place and brings people together to talk about their shared experiences.

item.title: Truths and Myths about Self-Driving Car Safety (Virtual) | April 9
item.description: Date: Wednesday, April 9, 2025 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM - The RPI Pittsburgh Alumni Chapter is hosting a live webinar with alumnus Philip Koopman ’82G. Professor Koopman is an internationally recognized expert on Autonomous Vehicle (AV) safety whose work in that area spans over 25 years. He has been involved with AV policy and standards as well as more general embedded system design and software quality. The entire RPI community is welcome to attend.

item.title: iEAR Presents! Suzi Analogue to speak at EMPAC on April 10
item.description: Suzi Analogue’s recent project commissioned by Alfreda Cinema and Brooklyn Academy of Music, BY ANY MEANZ SONICALLY, is a live electronic score set to a visual montage highlighting profound influence of Black women in electronic dance music, tracing their impact from the early roots in jazz and rhythm & blues to the global prominence of dance music today. Suzi will present her work as producer, educator, and cultural shape shifter. Join us from 2pm-5pm in EMPAC Studio Beta.

item.title: Commencement and Ph.D. Hooding Registration
item.description: Attention, graduates! Registration is open for this year’s Commencement ceremony and Ph.D. Hooding ceremony.
